thread.title: A Couple of Quilters.Com
thread.title_full: Easy Signs reviewed by A Couple of Quilters.Com

author: A Couple of Quilters.Com
title: A Couple of Quilters.Com
text: As a small hobby business operating from our home we sought assistance with advertsing our long-arm quilting service through a small sign containing our logo. Being quite a novice at ordering such things on line, and quite unfamiliar with the requirements to create our sign in the first place, we found all dealings - whether electronic our via phone - were encouraging and supportive. We never once felt "dumb". Thanks to all at Easy Signs for your patience and courtesy.
